meanings.definition: Of or relating to a zone.
meanings.sent1: The zonary map displayed all the different climate zones.
meanings.sent2: The zonary markings on the globe helped students learn about different regions.
meanings.sent3: The zonary weather forecast made everyone laugh as it showed rain only in one specific area.
meanings.sent4: Her zonary approach to organizing her closet by sections made it easy to find things.
meanings.sent5: The zonary boundaries of the national park were clearly marked with signs and fences.

meanings.sent1: The zonary belt of trees provided a natural barrier around the playground.
meanings.sent2: The zonary fence protected the garden from animals wandering in.
meanings.sent3: The zonary arrangement of chairs around the campfire created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The zonary clouds seemed to encircle the entire sky, creating a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The zonary pattern of lights around the stage added a magical touch to the performance.
